thread.title: Tom Brady's Kids Are So Cute - See the Best Family Photos!
thread.title_full: Tom Brady's Kids Are So Cute - See the Best Family Photos!

author: Just Jared
title: Tom Brady's Kids Are So Cute - See the Best Family Photos!
text:
Tom Brady is preparing to play in the 2017 Super Bowl with his team the New England Patriots and we’re taking a moment to remind fans how cute his family is!
The 39-year-old quarterback is married to model Gisele Bundchen and they share two children together – Benjamin , 7, and Vivian , 4.
Tom is also the father of a nine-year-old son named John with his ex-girlfriend Bridget Moynahan . They split in December 2006 right around the time that she became pregnant.
Gisele and Tom have been married since 2009 and they are the parents of Benjamin and Vivian . They both share a ton of photos of their kids across their social media pages and we’ve gathered some of the best recent pics in our gallery!
25+ pictures inside of Tom Brady and his kids…
